title: REVIEW --- Play: News Quiz
text:
B. Eleanor Iselin

C. Nellie Lovett

D. Lady Blystone

---

2. Three men won the Nobel Prize in Economics. Who wasn't among them?

A. Ben Bernanke

B. Douglas Diamond

C. Philip Dybvig

D. Simon Patten

---

3. Huge paychecks are luring senior executives to Neom. What's that?

A. A metaverse-based spa

B. A cloud-based collaboration startup

C. A carbon-neutral crypto miner

D. A futuristic real estate development in Saudi Arabia

---

4. Ozempic is all the rage for weight loss, an off-label use. What's the drug officially for?

A. Hypertension

B. Type 2 diabetes

C. ADHD

D. Depression

---

5. Social Security checks will get an 8.7% cost of living hike in 2023. What share of Americans 65 and older rely on the system for at least half their income?

A. 20%

B. 40%

C. 60%

D. 80%

---

6. America's oldest bank will start holding cryptocurrencies for customers. Which bank is that?

A. Citigroup

B. JPMorgan Chase

C. Bank of New York Mellon

D. The Chemung Canal Bank

---

7. Koi ponds caught on in the pandemic. Now koi wranglers are busy relocating them when people move. What type of fish are they?

A. Carp

B. Pollock

C. Haddock

D. Herring

---

8. After four years in police custody, dissident blogger Li Tingyu fled China. Where is she living now?

A. The U.S.

B. Canada

C. Germany

D. Russia

---

9. Despite a voting scandal, Bear Force One was crowned Fat Bear Week champ. In which national park does he live?

A. Katmai

B. Denali

C. Glacier Bay

D. Yellowstone

---

ANSWERS

1. B

2. D

3. D

4. B

5. B

6. C

7. A

8. C

9. A
